00032 RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameBase::gsGameBase(){
00033   LOGI("Constructing a gsGameBase");
00034   stateType=GST_GAME;
00035   mapName="";
00036   mMoveScale=2.0f;
00037   inputWrapper=new InputWrapper();
00038   mTranslateVector=Vector3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00039 }

00044 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameBase::init(){
00045   LOGI("Initialising gsGameBase");
00046 
00047   mRoot=GameEngine::getSingleton().getOgreRoot();
00048   mSceneMgr=GameEngine::getSingleton().getOgreSceneMgr();
00049 
00050   isInit=true;
00051 }

00109 const char* RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameBase::getMapName(){

00120 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameBase::keyPressed(const OIS::KeyEvent& evt){
00121   OIS::KeyCode kc=evt.key;
00122 
00123   if (kc==inputWrapper->getForward()){
00124     mTranslateVector.z = -mMoveScale;
00125   }
00126 
00127   if (kc==inputWrapper->getBackward()){
00128     mTranslateVector.z = mMoveScale;
00129   }
00130 
00131   if (kc==inputWrapper->getLeft()){
00132     mTranslateVector.x = -mMoveScale;
00133 
00134   }
00135 
00136   if (kc==inputWrapper->getRight()){
00137     mTranslateVector.x = mMoveScale;
00138 
00139   }
00140 }
00141 
00149 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameBase::keyReleased(const OIS::KeyEvent& evt){
00150   mTranslateVector=Vector3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00151 
00152 }
00153 
00161 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameBase::mouseMoved(const OIS::MouseEvent& evt){
00162   // Move the camera
00163   int x=evt.state.X.rel;
00164   int y=evt.state.Y.rel;
00165   mRotX = Degree(x * 0.13);
00166   mRotY = Degree(y * 0.13);
00167 }
00168

00179

00191 mouseReleased(const OIS::MouseEvent& evt, OIS::MouseButtonID id){
00192

00201 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameBase::moveCamera(){
00202   Camera* mCamera=GameEngine::getSingleton().getCamera();
00203   mCamera->yaw(-mRotX);
00204   mCamera->pitch(-mRotY);
00205   mCamera->moveRelative(mTranslateVector);
00206 
00207   mRotX=0;
00208   mRotY=0;
00209 }
